pkgmetadata.longdescription: Durability of Vaccine Efficacy // Implements maximum likelihood methods for evaluating the durability of vaccine efficacy in a randomized, placebo-controlled clinical trial with staggered enrollment of participants and potential crossover of placebo recipients before the end of the trial. Lin, D. Y., Zeng, D., and Gilbert, P. B. (2021) doi:10.1093/cid/ciab226 and Lin, D. Y., Gu, Y., Zeng, D., Janes, H. E., and Gilbert, P. B. (2021) doi:10.1093/cid/ciab630.
